description: Mohammed Rahman is a renowned Bangladeshi chef with over 10 years of experience. He specializes in traditional Bangladeshi cuisine and has won several awards for his culinary skills.

recipes.name: Bengali Fish Curry
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onions and fry until they turn golden brown. 
2. Add chopped garlic and ginger and fry for a minute. 
3. Add coriander powder and fry for another minute. 
4. Add beef and cook until it browns on all sides. 
5. Add water, cover and simmer for 30-45 minutes, or until the beef is tender. 
6. Serve hot with naan or rice.
